subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: An M.R.I. did not show any structural damage to the tendon sheath in Mark Teixeira’s right wrist, but he received a cortisone shot and will take a few days off.
snippet: An M.R.I. did not show any structural damage to the tendon sheath in Mark Teixeira’s right wrist, but he received a cortisone shot and will take a few days off.
